paragraphs.body: Police boats are black in coloration and appear to be powered by gasoline, since they do not have smokestacks. The boats are small, easily maneuverable, and are equipped with large spotlights on the tip of the hull for aid in nightly patrols. They are made from metal and have lifesavers on the deck for use in the instance of an emergency or accident. The interior of these boats are small, but have windows and lights within.
